QuestData.Title: Infection
QuestData.Description: The Empress's genemancers play with dangerous toys.$B$BTo the south, they are injecting local wildlife with pheromone-laden parasites, in an attempt to create monstrous mutations for war.$B$BCarelessly, they have allowed their parasitic worms to escape into the local ecosystem.$B$BLeft unchecked, the infection will spread from one animal to another, until we have an outbreak.$B$BI will inject you with a mild toxin. With it, you will be able to identify infected creatures.$B$BKill the carriers at once.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 6 infected wildlife. Infected wildlife may include Bonedust Moths, Bluehide Mushan, and Mutating Scorpid.
